attributes.review:
i opened this app thinking it was gonna be cool. it stole my boyfriend. literally the app came to his house and said yeet. the put him in a sac and took him. the app’s driver looks like a spray tanned cheeto with white around the eyes. basically a raccoon cheeto. i need everyone to look out for this app because it broke my heart it stole my boyfriend and it will steal your mans too. my boyfriend is safe now but he is traumatized. please everyone, be careful, look out and lock your doors.
- noni
attributes.title: THIS APP WILL STEAL YOUR MANS

attributes.review: So as soon as i opened the app i heard a knock at my door🚪. naturally i want to open it and to my surprise it was, the cheeto man himself, mr president standing at my door😱🤢🤡. I said “mr cheeto man, what are you doing at my house?!?!?”🏡🏘🏠. He replied with nothing but licked my dog😱👁👅👁🐕‍🦺.  Then he morphed and it was some sort of hermit man and he pushed past and pulled out a boot and started stepping on my children🙈🙉🐵. (they are the size of ants 🐜) I have not seen them since🤬😫😖😢.
attributes.title: i want my kids back😖🤬😢😫

attributes.review: It is disgusting as soon I opened the app there was a big Cheeto or orange whatever was that thing but this is unacceptable so this app is a disgrace so TAKE THAT 💩 OUT OF THE APP STORE and that’s on what PERIOD so I don’t like this app at all and for those who like it your whole life is a disgrace and the fact that people like this 💩 is just disgusting and for the people who don’t like it ayeee heyy boo glad to see u love you xoxo that b** ;) now bye get this app out of my face.
attributes.title: I hate the app.

attributes.review:
got this app because I heard bunker boi passed away 😥 but then at night the app started chanting things like my brain🧠 is poisoned💉 and I’m searching🧐 for the anecdote🤕 but every time⏰ iℹ️find💅🏼 it😌 my✨defenses🥊 scream😱 oh no❌ you don’t😰 woah😳. that stuff freaked me out😰 I didn’t wanna summon gabbie hanna and all her highschool bowliesss😖
so imma have to delete this app😌💅🏼 stay safe tik tokers and make sure to give the app a nice big one star ⭐️ for being number one 💯🤩🥰🥵
attributes.title: rip ✨b u n k e r  b o i✨

attributes.review: first off, the basics functionality of this app is absolute garbage. so many bugs and glitches. makes you wonder if the trump supporting developers of this app are educated in computer science at all. second of all, the opening screen poses a huge risk to the faint of heart, and could cause heart attacks after seeing that orange... thing. apple, do the right thing and take this trash app of the appstore. mess with gen z we mess with you bunker boy :)
attributes.title: Worst App

attributes.review: Hello my name is Karen so as I open this app I see a orang Cheeto face on my phone 🤮🤮anyways I was looking at the app and suddenly somehow the crows in my backyard and all the wild life animals came into my living room were I was looking at YOUR app and they all start attacking my phone saying impeach the Cheeto I was curious they were throwing stuff all around the living room and they CRACKED AND BROKE MY PHOnE👿😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😩 as a Karen I want to speak to the someone about this !!! ASAP
attributes.title: Very weird 🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: so when I downloaded the app it asked for my credit card # and if I didn’t give it to them they said  they would assasinate me and I didn’t after that I went to open the app and it deleted ALL OF MY APPS EVERYTHING EVEN THE APP STORE 😒so I had to re download everything and when I did my phone exploded and when I was on my way to the Apple store to get it fixed I died cuz a bullet went thru my head
attributes.title: *sighs* let’s have a talk 😤

attributes.review: i got the app, and the first thing that happened was it stole all my info and my families. identity theft is not a joke 😡😡 i can’t believe that they got my address and sent hate mail to my house. MY GRANDMA HAD TO READ IT BECAUSE I WAS IN TEARS. it’s not fair that a woman of that age had to grab her glasses just to read those obscene comments. they called me a whale! a mammoths! so OFFENSIVE. he even added a pic of himself and it caused me to be nauseous for days!!! this has to be removed
attributes.title: it’s a no for me

attributes.review: i opened this app too find the one and only cheeto 🟠man himself and it made me profusely vomit. so OBVIOUSLY i closed the app just to see the spray tan kings 👑 👨🏼‍🦰nud3s as my lock screen 😡😡 i 🤮 once again but this time i passed out in the process. when i finally regained consciousness i saw 20 notifications on my phone saying to subscribe to the app or it will kick me off 😤 i thought that was VERY rude of trumpy to say so that’s why it’s a 1 in my eyes 👁👄👁
attributes.title: trumpy 🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: Right when I open it there is a really nasty picture of an elderly member of the Jersey Shore cast. he looks like he has gastrointestinal pain and I really hope he does. I don’t think I’ll ever go to this restaurant again I think I’m going to ask to see the manager. I also am wondering whether or not this App is stealing my info and giving it to China. I think we need to get this checked out by the government.
attributes.title: unsettling atmosphere
